thread.title: UNI Panthers take home a loss against Illinois St.
thread.title_full: UNI Panthers take home a loss against Illinois St.

author: Stephanie Schroeder
title: UNI Panthers take home a loss against Illinois St.
text:
UNI Panthers take home a loss against Illinois St. Posted: Panthers Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> Get the latest news and sports information about the University of Northern Iowa Panthers sports teams, including football, basketball, volleyball, baseball and softball. More >> 
The UNI Panthers traveled to Illinois Saturday to face off against the Illinois St. Redbirds at Hancock Stadium. 
Both the Panthers and the Redbirds came into this game with 2-1 rankings. 
Right off the bat Illinois St. jumps ahead with a touchdown, and then focused on defense for the rest of the quarter. 
In the second quarter, Illinois St. scores another touchdown, but UNI soon gains their footing and answers with a touchdown of their own. After another touchdown by Illinois St. the score was 17-7, Redbirds in the lead, going into halftime. 
In the third quarter, both teams put up their best defenses and the only score that was made all quarter was a field goal by UNI. 
The fourth quarter was much of the same, with another field goal made by UNI. 
Both teams put their best defenses forward, proving to be near unmovable obstacles for each other. 
The final score was 21-13, Illinois St. over UNI. Can't Find Something? 500 Fourth St. Waterloo, IA 50703 News: (319) 291-1200
